constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 86 (Tuesday, May 18, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MURPHY of North Carolina:
H.R. 3315.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the United States Constitution.
[Page H2542]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water, Oceans, and Wildlife.

title: To revise the boundaries of a unit of the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System in Topsail, North Carolina, and for other purposes.
